articles.content: Making airlines responsible for policing Irelands mandatory hotel quarantine rules is simply mad, according to Europes largest airline association, which expressed surprise at the Governments move. … [+3247 chars]

articles.title: Ancient tools 'reveal clues about gendered roles in European farming societies' - The Irish News
articles.description: Analysis of 400 stone objects from graves across Europe showed men and women were equal contributors to their community, researchers said.
articles.content:
Ancient tools found in graves across Europe suggest women and men performed specific gender-based tasks in farming societies about 5,000 years ago, according to scientists.

articles.title: Stop taking us for fools! Clement Beaune confronted with four EU policies crippling France - Daily Express
articles.description: FRANCE'S Europe Minister has come under fierce criticism for claiming the coronavirus crisis demonstrates the need for a 'European Union for health'.
